blocks.name: constcncf
blocks.content: A constant function is a continuous function on ` CC ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Moved into main set.mm as ~ cncfmptc and may be deleted by mathbox owner, JM. --MC 12-Sep-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: idcncf
blocks.content: The identity function is a continuous function on ` CC ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.) (Moved into main set.mm as ~ cncfmptid and may be deleted by mathbox owner, JM. --MC 12-Sep-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: sub1cncf
blocks.content: Subtracting a constant is a continuous function. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sub1cncf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, co(cc, ccncf, cc)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cc, co(cv(s0), cmin, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl5eqel(c1, co(cc, ccncf, cc), cmpt(s0, cc, co(cv(s0), cmin, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  cncfmpt2f(s0, cc, cv(s0), cmin, c0, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cmin, co(co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), ctx, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), ccn, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))))
  subcn(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cmpt(s0, cc, cv(s0)), co(cc, ccncf, cc)))
  idcncf(s0, cmpt(s0, cc, cv(s0)))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cc, cv(s0)))
  mp3an23(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cmpt(s0, cc, c0), co(cc, ccncf, cc)), wss(cc, cc), wss(cc, cc))
  ssid(cc)
  cncfmptc(s0, c0, cc, cc)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopn, ccnfld)
  diff.ctopn.s(s0)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sub1cncf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℂ → c1 ∈(ℂ[-cn->]ℂ))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℂ ↦(s0[-]c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl5eqel(c1, (ℂ[-cn->]ℂ), (s0 ∈ ℂ ↦(s0[-]c0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  cncfmpt2f(s0, cc, s0, cmin, c0, (TopOpen ` CCfld), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℂ, - ∈(((TopOpen ` CCfld)[tX](TopOpen ` CCfld))[Cn](TopOpen ` CCfld)))
  subcn((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  eqid((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℂ, (s0 ∈ ℂ ↦ s0)∈(ℂ[-cn->]ℂ))
  idcncf(s0, (s0 ∈ ℂ ↦ s0))
  eqid((s0 ∈ ℂ ↦ s0))
  mp3an23(c0 ∈ ℂ, (s0 ∈ ℂ ↦ c0)∈(ℂ[-cn->]ℂ), ℂ ⊆ ℂ, ℂ ⊆ ℂ)
  ssid(cc)
  cncfmptc(s0, c0, cc, cc)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopn, ccnfld)
  diff.ctopn.s(s0)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: sub2cncf
blocks.content: Subtraction from a constant is a continuous function. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sub2cncf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, co(cc, ccncf, cc)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cc, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl5eqel(c1, co(cc, ccncf, cc), cmpt(s0, cc, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cc))
  cncfmpt2f(s0, cc, c0, cmin, cv(s0), cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cmin, co(co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), ctx, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), ccn, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))))
  subcn(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  mp3an23(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cmpt(s0, cc, c0), co(cc, ccncf, cc)), wss(cc, cc), wss(cc, cc))
  ssid(cc)
  cncfmptc(s0, c0, cc, cc)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cmpt(s0, cc, cv(s0)), co(cc, ccncf, cc)))
  idcncf(s0, cmpt(s0, cc, cv(s0)))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cc, cv(s0)))
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopn, ccnfld)
  diff.ctopn.s(s0)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sub2cncf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℂ → c1 ∈(ℂ[-cn->]ℂ))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℂ ↦(c0[-]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  syl5eqel(c1, (ℂ[-cn->]ℂ), (s0 ∈ ℂ ↦(c0[-]s0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  cncfmpt2f(s0, cc, c0, cmin, s0, (TopOpen ` CCfld), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℂ, - ∈(((TopOpen ` CCfld)[tX](TopOpen ` CCfld))[Cn](TopOpen ` CCfld)))
  subcn((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  eqid((TopOpen ` CCfld))
  mp3an23(c0 ∈ ℂ, (s0 ∈ ℂ ↦ c0)∈(ℂ[-cn->]ℂ), ℂ ⊆ ℂ, ℂ ⊆ ℂ)
  ssid(cc)
  cncfmptc(s0, c0, cc, cc)
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℂ, (s0 ∈ ℂ ↦ s0)∈(ℂ[-cn->]ℂ))
  idcncf(s0, (s0 ∈ ℂ ↦ s0))
  eqid((s0 ∈ ℂ ↦ s0))
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopn, ccnfld)
  diff.ctopn.s(s0)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cnres2
blocks.content: The restriction of a continuous function to a subset is continuous. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnres2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))), wcel(cres(c6, c2), co(co(c0, crest, c2), ccn, co(c1, crest, c4))))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cuni(c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))), wcel(cres(c6, c2), co(co(c0, crest, c2), ccn, co(c1, crest, c4)))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))), wcel(cres(c6, c2), co(co(c0, crest, c2), ccn, co(c1, crest, c4)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))), wcel(cres(c6, c2), co(co(c0, crest, c2), ccn, co(c1, crest, c4)))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))), wcel(cres(c6, c2), co(co(c0, crest, c2), ccn, co(c1, crest, c4)))), diffsc(s0, c5))
  mpbid(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))), wcel(cres(c6, c2), co(co(c0, crest, c2), ccn, co(c1, crest, c4))), wcel(cres(c6, c2), co(co(c0, crest, c2), ccn, c1)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))), wcel(cres(c6, c2), co(co(c0, crest, c2), ccn, c1)), wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wss(c2, c3))
  cnrest(c6, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syl3anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))), wb(wcel(cres(c6, c2), co(co(c0, crest, c2), ccn, c1)), wcel(cres(c6, c2), co(co(c0, crest, c2), ccn, co(c1, crest, c4)))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c5)), wss(crn(cres(c6, c2)), c4), wss(c4, c5))
  sylib(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c5)), wcel(c1, ctop))
  simp1r(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4))))
  toptopon(c1, c5)
  syl5eqssr(crn(cres(c6, c2)), c4, cima(c6, c2), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))))
  df-ima(c6, c2)
  mpbird(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))), wss(cima(c6, c2), c4), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))
  simp3r(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))), wb(wss(cima(c6, c2), c4), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4))), wfun(c6), wss(c2, cdm(c6)))
  3syl(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))), wfun(c6), wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wf(c6, c3, c5))
  ffun(c6, c3, c5)
  sseqtr4d(c2, cdm(c6), c3, w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))))
  simp2l(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4))))
  3syl(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))), wceq(cdm(c6), c3), wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wf(c6, c3, c5))
  simp3l(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5)), wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4)))
  cnf(c6, c0, c1, c3, c5)
  fdm(c6, c3, c5)
  funimass4(s0, c6, c2, c4)
  simp2r(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5), wa(wcel(c6, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c4))))
  cnrest2(c1, c5, cres(c6, c2), c4, co(c0, crest, c2))
}

blocks.name: cnresima
blocks.content: A continuous function is continuous onto its image. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnresima(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1))), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, co(c1, crest, crn(c2)))))
} = {
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1))), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, co(c1, crest, crn(c2)))), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1))), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, co(c1, crest, crn(c2))))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wss(crn(c2), crn(c2)), wss(crn(c2), cuni(c1)))
  sylib(w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wcel(c1, ctop))
  simp2(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1)))
  toptopon(c1, cuni(c1))
  ssidd(crn(c2), w3a(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1)), wss(crn(c2), cuni(c1)))
  frnd(c2, cuni(c1), cuni(c0), wcel(c2, co(c0, ccn, c1)))
  cnf(c2, c0, c1, cuni(c0), cuni(c1))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  cnrest2(c1, cuni(c1), c2, crn(c2), c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnresima(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 ∈(c0[Cn]c1))→ c2 ∈(c0[Cn](c1[|`t]ran(c2))))
} = {
  mpbid((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 ∈(c0[Cn]c1)), c2 ∈(c0[Cn](c1[|`t]ran(c2))), c2 ∈(c0[Cn]c1))
  simp3(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Top, c2 ∈(c0[Cn]c1))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 ∈(c0[Cn]c1)), (c2 ∈(c0[Cn]c1)↔ c2 ∈(c0[Cn](c1[|`t]ran(c2)))), c1 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c1), ran(c2)⊆ ran(c2), ran(c2)⊆ ⋃ c1)
  sylib((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 ∈(c0[Cn]c1)), c1 ∈(TopOn ` ⋃ c1), c1 ∈ Top)
  simp2(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Top, c2 ∈(c0[Cn]c1))
  toptopon(c1, ⋃ c1)
  ssidd(ran(c2), (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 ∈(c0[Cn]c1)))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Top, c2 ∈(c0[Cn]c1), ran(c2)⊆ ⋃ c1)
  frnd(c2, ⋃ c1, ⋃ c0, c2 ∈(c0[Cn]c1))
  cnf(c2, c0, c1, ⋃ c0, ⋃ c1)
  eqid(⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ c1)
  cnrest2(c1, ⋃ c1, c2, ran(c2), c0)
}

blocks.name: cncfres
blocks.content: A continuous function on complex numbers restricted to a subset. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cncfres(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2))
  -| wss(c3, cc)
  -| wss(c4, cc)
  -| wceq(c5, cmpt(s0, cc, c6))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c3, c6))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c6, c4))
  -| wcel(c5, co(cc, ccncf, cc))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c3, c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c4, c4))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  eleqtri(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2), co(c3, ccncf, c4))
  mpbir(wcel(c0, co(c3, ccncf, c4)), wf(c0, c3, c4))
  fmpti(s0, c0, c3, c4, c6)
  mp2an(wb(wcel(c0, co(c3, ccncf, c4)), wf(c0, c3, c4)), wss(c4, cc), wcel(c0, co(c3, ccncf, cc)))
  eqeltri(c0, co(c3, ccncf, cc), cres(cmpt(s0, cc, c6), c3))
  eqtr4i(c0, cres(cmpt(s0, cc, c6), c3), cmpt(s0, c3, c6))
  ax-mp(wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, cc, c6), c3), cmpt(s0, c3, c6)), wss(c3, cc))
  resmpt(s0, c3, cc, c6)
  mp2(wcel(cres(cmpt(s0, cc, c6), c3), co(c3, ccncf, cc)), wss(c3, cc), wcel(cmpt(s0, cc, c6), co(cc, ccncf, cc)))
  eqeltrri(cmpt(s0, cc, c6), co(cc, ccncf, cc), c5)
  rescncf(c3, cc, cmpt(s0, cc, c6), cc)
  cncffvrn(c4, c0, c3, cc)
  mp2an(wceq(co(c3, ccncf, c4), co(c1, ccn, c2)), wss(c3, cc), wss(c4, cc))
  cncfmet(c3, c4, c1, c2, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c3, c3)), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c4, c4)))
  eqid(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c3, c3)))
  eqid(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c4, c4)))
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cncfres(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2)
  ⊣ c3 ⊆ ℂ
  ⊣ c4 ⊆ ℂ
  ⊣ c5 =(s0 ∈ ℂ ↦ c6)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c6)
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c3 → c6 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ c5 ∈(ℂ[-cn->]ℂ)

  eqeltrri((s0 ∈ ℂ ↦ c6), (ℂ[-cn->]ℂ), c5)

  cncfmet(c3, c4, c1, c2, ((abs ∘ -)|`(c3 × c3)), ((abs ∘ -)|`(c4 × c4)))
